pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
[Description = "Parameter for date range in days, data to load."]
shared parDateRange = let
    Parameter1 = 740 meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type number]
in
    Parameter1;
shared XX_INVORG_DIM = let
    Source = Value.NativeQuery(Snowflake.Databases("mma12090.snowflakecomputing.com","COMPUTE_REPORTING",[Role="GLBMFGOPERATIONSROLE"]){[Name="PROD_DB"]}[Data], "SELECT * FROM PROD_DB.XXDIMS.XX_INVORG_DIM", null, [EnableFolding=true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"INVORG_ID", Int64.Type}, {"OPERATING_UNIT_ID", Int64.Type}, {"LEDGER_ID", Int64.Type}, {"CREATION_DATE", type date}}),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Changed column type", {"INVORG_ID", "OPERATING_UNIT_ID", "LEDGER_ID", "GL_ENTITY", "OPERATING_UNIT", "LEDGER", "INVORG_CODE", "CURRENCY_CODE", "INVORG_CATEGORY", "INV_ORG_CODE_CUSTOWNED", "TIMEZONE", "DISABLE_DATE", "CREATION_DATE", "LAST_UPDATE_DATE", "INVORG_GROUP", "LABOR_TARGET_PCT", "BASELINE_FYFQ", "COUNTRY_CODE", "INVORG_TYPE", "REPORTING_PRODUCT_GROUP", "REPORTING_OWNED_BY"})
in
    #"Choose columns";
